markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crushing Grab](/Feats.aspx?ID=439) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 160 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127) (Level 4), [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182) (Level 4)

</column>

---

Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp. When you successfully Grapple a creature, you can deal bludgeoning damage to that creature equal to your Strength modifier. You can make this attack nonlethal with no penalty.
name: Crushing Grab
